resource.resourceType: IMAS data structures containing the inputs and outputs of integrated modelling simulations for the STEP Prototype Power Plant, version 1 (SPP-001)

titles.title: OpenSTEP: public data release of the STEP Prototype Powerplant scenario SPP-001

date.dateInformation: Free boundary equilibrium and coilset uploaded to SimDB (alias SPP1_CML5_FBE)
Integrated modelling scenarios uploaded to SimDB (alias smars/jetto/step/88888/oct1223/seq-1)
Publication of paper concerning free boundary equilibrium (https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/1741-4326/ad53e2)
Publication of paper concerning integrated modelling scenarios (https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/1741-4326/ad6ea2)

rightsList.rights: Access to the data resource is open.

descriptions.description:
This dataset contains a curated set of results from key physics simulations performed at UKAEA for the STEP Prototype Power Plant, version 1 (SPP-001). It includes the coilset, equilibrium, and kinetic profiles of the STEP plasma scenario.
The free-boundary equilibrium was computed using Fiesta, a Grad-Shafranov equilibrium solver. Kinetic profiles were simulated using JINTRAC, a 1.5D integrated modelling code incorporating transport, heating, current drive, fuelling, and fixed-boundary equilibrium updates.
The original data was published in the following papers: (1) Hudoba, A., et al. "Optimisation of the poloidal field system for advanced divertor configurations in STEP." Nuclear Fusion 64.8 (2024): 086055, (2) Tholerus, E., et al. "Flat-top plasma operational space of the STEP power plant." Nuclear Fusion 64.10 (2024): 106030.

The free-boundary equilibrium data includes: (1) equilibrium IDS, containing free-boundary equilibrium, (2) pf_active IDS, containing the coilset and currents, (3) wall IDS, containing a limiter point only.
The transport data includes: (1) core_profiles IDS, (2) core_sources IDS, (3) core_transport IDS, (4) equilibrium IDS, containing a fixed boundary equilibrium consistent with the kinetic profiles.
